TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/MdiCloseButton extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides objects for each state of the **Close** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 每一個屬性的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton>類別會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>不同狀態的**關閉**按鈕的 MDI 子視窗。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton.Normal%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiCloseButton1`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#391](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#391)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#391](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#391)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Disabled As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Close** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the disabled state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 關閉 * * 按鈕的 MDI 子視窗中停用狀態。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton.Disabled%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton.Hot%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiCloseButton4`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#394](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#394)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#394](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#394)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Hot As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Close** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the hot state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 關閉 * * MDI 子視窗按鈕處於作用中狀態。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton.Hot%2A>屬性以建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Window.MdiCloseButton.Hot%2A>屬性。 若要執行這個範例，請將其貼入 Windows Form 中。 處理表單的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件和呼叫`DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiCloseButton2`方法從<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint>事件處理方法，傳遞`e`為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Normal As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Close** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the normal state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 關閉 * * 按鈕的 MDI 子視窗處於正常狀態。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pressed As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents the **Close** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window in the pressed state.
Docs.value: A表示 * * 關閉 * * 的 MDI 子視窗中按下狀態的按鈕。
